page.title: 10DUNDARAVE ESTATE (BUSHMILLS)
page.content: Dundarave House is set on a height above the town of Bushmills in the middle of a large estate. The house enjoys magnificent views over the spectacular North Antrim coastline. The present house was built for{Sir {Edmund McNaghten in 1847}by Charles Lanyon.The present successor to Dundarave Estate is Sir Patrick McNaghten who resides there. Much of the estate consists of well wooded areas. The rest of the land is either farmed privately by the McNaghten family as Dundarave Estates or set as conacre every year to local farmers.
